entities.name: family members
entities.description: Refers to all family members who need to be aware of emergency measures.

entities.name: Shield Charms
entities.description: A type of charm that provides protection.

entities.name: Disillusionment Charms
entities.description: A type of charm that helps to disguise or conceal something.

entities.name: Side-Along Apparition
entities.description: A spell that allows a wizard to accompany another person on an apparition.

entities.name: close friends and family
entities.description: Refers to people who are close to the speaker and need to be aware of security questions.

entities.name: Death Eaters
entities.description: A group of followers of Lord Voldemort.

entities.name: Polyjuice Potion
entities.description: A potion that allows a person to take on the appearance of another.

entities.name: Magical Law Enforcement Squad
entities.description: An organization responsible for enforcing magical laws.

entities.name: colleagues
entities.description: Refers to people who work with the speaker.

entities.name: friends
entities.description: Refers to people who are friends of the speaker.

entities.name: neighbours
entities.description: Refers to people who live nearby.

entities.name: Dark Mark
entities.description: A symbol associated with Lord Voldemort and his followers.

entities.name: Imperius Curse
entities.description: A curse that allows a person to control another's actions.

relationships.description: Family members need to be aware of Shield Charms.
Family members need to be aware of Disillusionment Charms.
Close friends and family need to agree on security questions.
A family member may be vulnerable to Polyjuice Potion if they are under-age.
If someone is acting strangely, contact the Magical Law Enforcement Squad.
The Magical Law Enforcement Squad may be able to help a person who has been put under the Imperius Curse.
The Dark Mark is associated with any dwelling place where it appears.
